Within the scope of the democratization package, it is taking an important step to change the electoral system first; election system.
We are changing the scope of state aid to the Political Parties. We raise the current rate of 7 percent for state aid to 3 percent.
It facilitates the organization of political parties and removes the necessity of establishing organizations on the grounds.
We have the possibility of applying the spousal system of the political parties with no more than two people.
We are removing barriers to political party membership. Everyone who has the right to vote can be a member of political parties.
In pre-elections, we bring political propaganda in different languages ​​and dialects.
If we are treated with hate motives, we are increasing the punishment of certain offenses.
We are increasing the amount of penalties to fight discrimination more effectively. We are setting up an institution of fight against discrimination and equality.
We respect life style and secure it with Turkish criminal law.
We extend the duration of meetings and demonstration walks.
At private schools, we open the way for education in different languages ​​and dialects.
We are removing obstacles in front of correcting village names. We will consider incoming requests to change provincial and district names
We change the name of Nevşehir University to Hacı Bektaş Veli University.
We provide legal safeguards for the protection of personal data. Personal data will not be used by uninterested people and will not be shared.
We are removing constraints on help aggregate. Our citizens will be able to give their help in whatever direction they desire.
We are removing the headscarf ban in public institutions by changing the dress code.
We are removing student andi application in primary school.
Mor Gabriel, also known as Deyrulumur monastery, is returned to the monastery foundation.
We are setting up a Roma language and culture institute, taking steps to improve living conditions and solve problems in education
I wish the reform package to be beneficial to my country and to the nation, I offer my love and respect.
